Description: The year for the sector energy use. The year must be avaliable in the Eurostat report

The base year for the sector emissions. See `European Environment Agency (EEA) <https://www.eea.europa.eu/data-and-maps/data/national-emissions-reported-to-the-unfccc-and-to-the-eu-greenhouse-gas-monitoring-mechanism-16>`_.
Specify which sectoral emissions are taken into account. Data derived from EEA. Currently only CO2 is implemented.
